title: Blood Debt Bound
description: Debt  Something owed; such as money, goods, or services.  This is what I am, a payment for my husbandâ€™s gambling debt, my blood used to repay a vampire named Baxter. How can I ever trust the man I love again? I tried to help my husband, but he betrayed me to a worse fate. Now I am the prize in a vampire power struggle which has been going on for eons. A bond forged unknowingly upon me has left my emotional feelings altered forever, which way will I turn when given a choice?  Bound  Confined by bonds; tied.  This is what I am, chained as a slave before becoming immortal, betrayed by trusted friends, loosing love and forced to rebuild. Offered blood for a debt owed which changed everything I feel. I pushed Nadine away to save her. I now have the chance to win that love back and destroy the one who betrayed me. Will my maker support me? Will I get back all that I have lost or will it all fall in flames?  WARNING Written in British English. This story is a Paranormal Romance Novella (44500+ words) which contains graphic descriptions, sexual situations, and strong language. 18+ advised.
author: Sammie J.
